architectural_notes: Manter um estado global (ou compartilhado) do par de trade selecionado para refletir automaticamente a seleção entre as abas Oportunidades, Market, Turn Monitor e 3 Min Checklist.

existing_features.title: Create a single shared "selected trading pair" state for the Dashboard tabs so that changing the symbol in any one of these places updates the others automatically: (1) the selected opportunity in the Opportunity Recognition (Oportunidades) tab, (2) the Market tab (including Market Turn Monitor), and (3) the Checklist tab (3m checklist).

Update OpportunityRecognitionPanel to expose a symbol-selection callback so that selecting an opportunity symbol triggers the shared Dashboard symbol update (without requiring the user to manually re-select the symbol in other tabs).

new_feature_requests.summary: Sincronizar automaticamente o par de trade selecionado na aba Oportunidades com as abas Market, Turn Monitor e 3 Min Checklist

projectName: Sync selected opportunity symbol across Market Turn Monitor and 3m Checklist tabs
